Desc.entry: A registered charity that offers advice to people from the Sharrow, Broomhall, Nether Edge, Abbeydale and surrounding areas on the following issues: benefits, immigration (level 1 & 2), employment, housing, consumer, tax, debt, child support, relationship breakdown, etc. Home visits within the local area. Helps with reviews and represents at Social Security tribunals. At the drop-in sessions clients are first given a short, confidential interview to assess help needed (eg information, full advice appointment or referral - same day advice is not guaranteed). Specialist workers for Chinese, Vietnamese and Asian communities, plus Legal Services Commission funded housing specialist. Has Childrens Centre workers catering for families with children aged under 5 years in the local area. Runs outreach sessions at the Chinese Community Centre and Hanover Medical Centre (see separate entries). Does not give advice by email. Company limited by guarantee no 5149217.

Telephone.entry: Tues 10am-12noon and also at drop-in times subject to staffing
Cantonese, Punjabi or Urdu speaking advisors, and answerphone

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon, Wed & Thurs 10am-3pm (drop-in advice sessions and appointments), Tues & Fri (appointments only), Tues 10am-12noon (telephone only service)
